meanings.definition: The area near or surrounding a particular place.
meanings.sent1: In the vicinities of the park, children play happily.
meanings.sent2: I often walk my dog in the vicinities of our neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the vicinities seem to have their own little community.
meanings.sent4: The vicinities of the old mansion hold many hidden secrets.
meanings.sent5: The vicinities of the bustling market are filled with colorful stalls.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being near or close in space.
meanings.sent1: The vicinities of the two houses are so close that you can hear each other's conversations.
meanings.sent2: The vicinities of the mountains provide a sense of peace and tranquility.
meanings.sent3: The vicinities of the noisy construction site make it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent4: The vicinities of the airport are always buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent5: The vicinities of the river are teeming with wildlife.
